sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_509970_tuleap.CreatePdf</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>CreatePdf</name><script><![CDATA[var CreatePdf = Class.create();
CreatePdf.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
	creatAttch: function(name,contentType, data){
		var attCreator = new GlideRecord('ecc_queue');
		attCreator.agent = "AttachmentCreator";
		attCreator.topic = "AttachmentCreator";
		attCreator.name =   "pdf" + ":" + contentType;
		attCreator.source = current.getTableName()+":"+current.sys_id;
		attCreator.payload = data;
		attCreator.insert();
	},

    type: 'CreatePdf'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-10-14 09:44:09</sys_created_on><sys_id>a816271a2f3bd410fb4428a62799b6d4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>CreatePdf</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Tuleap" source="x_509970_tuleap">bc520bf72f635010fb4428a62799b686</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Tuleap">bc520bf72f635010fb4428a62799b686</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_a816271a2f3bd410fb4428a62799b6d4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-10-14 09:44:09</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
